Class SMTPConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • Ace
      • whiz.Whiz
        • whiz.WhizEntity

            • whiz.net.NetworkConnection
              • whiz.net.clients.TcpConnection
                • whiz.net.clients.SMTPConnector

  • public class SMTPConnector
extends TcpConnection
    Useful SMTP connector class. NOTE: built following RFC 2821
